item.title: Ignited Minds - A Book Summary
item.description: Problems in modern India​ India has unlimited potential in terms of resources, education, business, energy.​ Yet we are in Self-destruction mode due to​ Faltering economy​ Rampaging poverty​ Dependence on foreign nations​ Disharmony among diverse groups Key Takeaways​ Youth rise to the occasion - learn, innovate and push the boundaries​ Wholesome education.​ Scientific temper and a spirit of enquiry​ Change in attitude( of limited achievement) and aptitude ​ Grab the opportunity or create the opportunity​ Patriotism beyond Politics and Religion​ Investments in Nuclear resources​

item.title: The importance of education in National Integration
item.description: The beauty of a garden lies in the varieties of flowers it holds. No one would like a garden if it has a single type of flower. It is nature’s dictum that all different things should co-exist together. Similarly, the beauty of our world lies in the diversity of people with their cultures interwoven. India is multi-cultural multi-lingual country since ages. With its different facets in every turn – be it religion, language, race, castes, it presents a different beautiful picture.

item.title: How 'MAKE IN INDIA' can succeed ?
item.description: Make In India is an initiative launched by our Government to encourage multi-national, as well as national companies to manufacture their products in India. The objective of this initiative is to transform India into a global design and manufacturing hub. Our country has 16% of world population. So, in pure technical sense, one in six objects produced anywhere in the world should find its market in India. If we become self-reliant in our requirements, the precious foreign exchange will not go out of our country.
